LanguageData.Spaceports_ImmediateDepartureTooltip: Force this shuttle to take off and depart immediately, regardless of whether or not all required items are loaded.
LanguageData.Spaceports_RecallPartyTooltip: Force this shuttle's owning party to immediately board and depart.
LanguageData.Spaceports_GizmoDisabled: you do not have control over this shuttle, or this shuttle is incapable of taking off.
LanguageData.AccessControlDesc: Specify what type of shuttles are allowed to use this pad.
LanguageData.Spaceports_AirspaceLockdownDesc:
Due to the presence of hostiles, or because it was manually activated, one or more of your colonies has automatically entered airspace lockdown. No new shuttles of any type will arrive, but any landed shuttles can still depart. 

Colonies currently under airspace lockdown:
LanguageData.Spaceports_AutoEvacDesc:
Due to the presence of hostiles, one or more of your colonies has initiated automatic evacuation of shuttle visitors. 

Colonies currently performing auto-evacuation:
LanguageData.Spaceports_BeaconNoPads: \nNo active landing pads detected - spaceport offline.
LanguageData.Spaceports_BeaconPadsFull: \nAll landing pads are full - landings suspended.
LanguageData.Spaceports_CallTaxiTooltip: Call a single-use automated taxi shuttle for 500 silver.
LanguageData.Spaceports_CallTaxiDisabled: beacon is unpowered - cannot establish uplink to taxi service.
LanguageData.Spaceports_CallTaxiDisabledDLC: this feature requires the Royalty DLC.
LanguageData.Spaceports_CallTaxiInfo: Service: One-way automated taxi shuttle\nFare: 500 silver\nBoarding: first open pad
LanguageData.Spaceports_CannotProceedSilver: \nCannot proceed: insufficent silver. (Is it not within a trade beacon zone?)
LanguageData.Spaceports_DismissAllTooltip: Force all shuttles on the map to depart immediately, regardless of whether or not all required items are loaded.
LanguageData.Spaceports_RecallAllTooltip: Force the owning parties of all shuttles on the map to immediately board and depart.
